title: Pollution
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions and Bank of New South Wales
brief_description: Deals with air, harbour and beach pollution in Sydney, from car exhausts, chimney discharge, rubbish dumping and the disposal of sewage into the sea. This hard hitting appraisal of the situation deplores the unfortunate attitudes of people and industry to this ever increasing problem which is affecting our way of life.
